content: C4/36-350 Fast charger Multi-voltage fast charger for all Hilti Li-ion batteries ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Batteries, chargers, and power stations- - - ### FEATURES:Features Fast charger to quickly charge all Hilti Li-ion batteries thanks to the max output of 9A and 350W Designed to help protect batteries from low voltage and other adverse charging conditions Fully compatible with all Hilti 12V (with adapter), 14V, 22V and 36V Li-ion batteries Applications Fast charging of all Hilti Li-ion batteries ### TECHNICAL DATA: Battery voltage compatibility: 22 V, 36 V Output power: 350 W Output current: 9 A Technical Data | Battery voltage compatibility | 22 V, 36 V | Output power | 350 W | Output current | 9 A | Status display | Yes | Weight | 2.43 lb | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 6.7 x 6.4 x 2.8 in | Rated input voltage | 115 V ### ITEMS- 2028878 - Battery charger C 4/36-350 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x C 4/36-350 110-127V Battery charger
